name: Mona Pullover Hoodlie
description: Whether you're after energizing activity or eye-catching apparel, the Mona Pullover is what you want. You'll stay warm and look fashionable, wherever you are.<br /> <br /> • Light green heathered hoodie. <br /> • Long-Sleeve, pullover.<br /> • Long elliptical hem for extra coverage.<br /> • Deep button placket for layering.<br /> • Double rib design.<br /> • Mid layer, mid weight.<br /> • 98% Merino Wool / 2% Spandex
